candidates.text: Customer support tickets get lost between Slack and email

selectedCandidate: Customer support tickets get lost between Slack and email

autopsy.originsConstraints: Started as a quick fix during a major incident and somehow became permanent policy. The tech startup industry had different pressures then, and the process reflected that reality.
autopsy.assumptionsWorkarounds: The belief that 'this is how it's always been done' has prevented anyone from questioning it. Meanwhile, people have built workarounds: informal networks that bypass the official channels.
autopsy.stakesOutcomes: Multiple teams have optimized around the dysfunction - changing it affects everyone. The real goal is reduced risk, but the current process has become an end in itself.

workflow.aiDoes: Collects data from multiple sources, runs initial analysis, flags anomalies
workflow.humanDoes: Validates findings, adds context AI can't access, makes final calls
workflow.reasoning: AI excels at this type of work. Consistency is the key value-add.

workflow.aiDoes: Drafts communications, maintains consistency, handles routine updates
workflow.humanDoes: Reviews for tone, handles sensitive messages, manages relationships
workflow.reasoning: Routine enough for AI with this type of work. Human relationships matter here.

workflow.aiDoes: Runs all standard checks, compares against requirements, documents findings
workflow.humanDoes: Reviews exceptions, makes judgment calls, signs off on final output
workflow.reasoning: Quality requires this type of work. Human relationships matter here.

workflow.aiDoes: Manages calendars, resolves conflicts, sends reminders, tracks completion
workflow.humanDoes: Handles escalations, makes priority decisions, manages exceptions
workflow.reasoning: AI excels at this type of work. Consistency is the key value-add.

workflow.aiDoes: Suggests templates, organizes information, maintains consistency
workflow.humanDoes: Provides expertise, validates accuracy, decides what matters
workflow.reasoning: Human judgment needed for this type of work. Patterns are clear and repeatable.

desuck.learning: Track satisfaction scores weekly. Feed human corrections back to improve AI recommendations. Review collaboration modes monthly and adjust based on what's working.

transition.humanElement: Start with the team that feels the pain most. Get the affected team aligned before expanding.
transition.pilotPlan: Run a 2-week pilot with a single team. Measure before and after, then scale based on results.
